Reference Works

  • Oxford Classical Dictionary
    Call Number: MSPAL Reference | DE5 .O9 1996
    ISBN: 019866172X
    Go-to reference book for all things Classical and Antiquity!

These books are located in the REFERENCE section of the Michelle Smith Performing Arts Library and/or McKeldin Library.

  • The Cambridge companion to Greek and Roman theatre
    Call Number: MSPAL Stacks | PA3201 .C26 2007
    ISBN: 0521834562
  • A companion to Greek tragedy
    Call Number: McKeldin Library Stacks | PA3131 .C56 2005
    ISBN: 1405107707
  • The Facts On File companion to classical drama
    Call Number: MSPAL Reference | PA3024 .T48 2005
    ISBN: 0816052026
